lyrics:

i close my eyes all that i see
is a thousand spawn chewing at me

chorus alice glass
straight from my bones
back in my hands

back in my hands
too old to be my daughter

its so wrong ive seen it all before

theres no way you came out of me

chorus alice glass
straight from my bones
back in my hands
straight from my blood
back in my hands
too old to be my daughter
too young to be my friend
you might also likebridge alice glass

that was inside of me

ill pass you to the sea

that was inside of me
ill throw you in the ocean
